comment:
"По клику на трупы оперативников Железного шепота, ряженых в культистов
Провал чека персепшна"

languages.text: Еретики, слишком приблизившиеся к заряженному Движущей силой механизму, были убиты одним сокрушительным ударом молнии.
The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.
languages.original_text: Еретики, слишком приблизившиеся к заряженному Движущей силой механизму, были убиты одним сокрушительным ударом молнии.

traits.locale_text: The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.
The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.
The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.
The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.
The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.
The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.

languages.text: Die Ketzer, die dem antriebskraftbeseelten Mechanismus zu nah gekommen sind, wurden durch einen einzigen verheerenden Blitzschlag getötet.
languages.original_text: The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.

traits.locale_text: Die Ketzer, die dem antriebskraftbeseelten Mechanismus zu nah gekommen sind, wurden durch einen einzigen verheerenden Blitzschlag getötet.

languages.text: Les hérétiques qui se sont approchés trop près du mécanisme nimbé de Force Motrice ont été tués par un seul éclair surpuissant.
languages.original_text: The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.

traits.locale_text: Les hérétiques qui se sont approchés trop près du mécanisme nimbé de Force Motrice ont été tués par un seul éclair surpuissant.

languages.text: 那些异端分子离源力的机器太近了，被毁灭性的电击瞬间杀死。
languages.original_text: The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.

traits.locale_text: 那些异端分子离原初动力的机器太近了，被毁灭性的电击瞬间杀死。

languages.text: 動力が染み込んだ機械に近づきすぎた異端者たちは、強烈な雷撃を受けて命を落とした。
languages.original_text: The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.

traits.locale_text: 動力が染み込んだ機械に近づきすぎた異端者たちは、強烈な落雷が一発当たって命を落とした。

languages.text: Los herejes que se acercaron demasiado al mecanismo infundido por la Fuerza Motriz murieron a causa de un rayo devastador.
languages.original_text: The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.

traits.locale_text: Los herejes que se acercaron demasiado al mecanismo infundido por la Fuerza Motriz murieron a causa de un rayo devastador.

languages.text: Devinim Gücü aşılanmış mekanizmaya çok yaklaşan kâfirler, tek bir yıkıcı yıldırım çarpmasıyla ölmüş.
languages.original_text: The heretics who came too close to the Motive Force-infused mechanism were killed by a single devastating lightning strike.

traits.locale_text: Devinim Gücü aşılanmış mekanizmaya çok yaklaşan kâfirler, tek bir yıkıcı yıldırım çarpmasıyla ölmüş.
